alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 3:43PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Fremont County through 415 PM MDT... At 341 PM MDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm over Red Canyon, or 12 miles southeast of Lander, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Fremont County. Elevations above 7000 feet will have precipitation in the form of snow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East
